content.name: InSectorFinder HNYE
content.description: Saves Friendly. Fixed bag with fake signal of free ships. Uses: 1) Activate and Deactivate Long Range Scan Mode. 2) In opened menu, you have a choices: (a) free ships, (b) gates, (c) highways, (d) stations, (e) all in one, (f) EXIT. Ships will be markered by Beacons 'free ship'. Happy New Year, Pilot.
content.author: smilebobr
